document.full_text: syrian tanks and troops stormed three districts of the central city of homs and swept into several southern towns on sunday, residents said, in a campaign to crush an uprising against autocratic baathist rule.
document.title: syrian tanks storm homs districts, southern towns
lines_and_colors: syrian tanks and troops stormed three districts of the central city of homs and swept into several southern towns on sunday, residents said, in a campaign to crush an uprising against autocratic baathist rule.
